title: Remco Evenepoel downplays Vuelta a España chances for Sepp Kuss: ‘I consider him as an outsider’
content:
Tour-Giro winner Egan Bernal says rivals are making a mistake if they overlook the Colorado climber: 'Kuss has the level to fight for the overall, that's obvious.'

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel downplays Vuelta a España chances for Sepp Kuss: ‘I consider him as an outsider’ on Velo.
author: ahood
